classes.name: zui-steps
classes.description: The zui-steps turns an ordered list into a steps overview.

classes.name: zui-steps-step
classes.description: The zui-steps-step class should be set on a list item element. It tells the pattern that the list item is a single step and makes the step active by default. All steps that come after the zui-steps-current will be inactive.

classes.name: zui-steps-step-current
classes.description: The zui-steps-step-current class is a trigger to tell the pattern that all zui-steps-step that come after this element will be inactive.
